programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Explore a world never seen before - a world hidden under miles of water, the landscape of the ocean bed. Combining the latest scientific data with state of the art CGI computer hardware we reveal some of the worlds sunken mysteries. The Titanic, a WWII sunken battleship and the mysterious Flight 19 lost in the Bermuda Triangle. Using already aired episodes of Drain the Ocean we will be able to highlight each of these sunken treasures and tell their stories.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: War...Weather...and human error have led to some of the worst maritime disasters in US history. But imagine if we could empty the oceans, letting the water drain away to reveal these secrets of Americas sea floor. Pearl Harbor, who fired the first shot? What are the dangerous forces that make Alcatraz and the San Francisco Bay so deadly? And how did drilling for oil result in one of the biggest environmental disasters in US history? Drained dry we reveal these sunken mysteries along Americas shores.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On January 15, 2009, US Airways Flight 1549 took off from New York Citys LaGuardia Airport and collided with a flock of birds, causing both engines to fail. Captain Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger and co-pilot Jeffrey Skyles successfully performed an emergency landing in the Hudson River, saving all 155 people on board. Survivors of the "Miracle on the Hudson" share their experiences.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: We begin in New Orleans where construction turned to destruction during the build of a brand new Hard Rock Hotel. The catastrophe left two cranes precariously dangling from the structure. The dismantling of the cranes is one of the most dramatic events we witness. The Big Dig in Boston was Americas most expensive infrastructure project ever. Delays and cost over-runs are legendary, but the collapse of the tunnels ceiling is an infamous example of how just a few extra dollars spent on the correct adhesive could have prevented a tragedy.

programme.title: Colossal Machines
programme.desc: Historically, mining has been a very dangerous and labor-intensive process. Now, with the evolution of engineering, colossal machines have made the unthinkable possible. Engineering experts share the development and functions of gearless mill drives, giant metal shredders, and explosive-clearing vehicles.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Under the muck of a Danish bog, a 2,400-year-old body is found so perfectly preserved the stubble on the dead mans chin is visible … as is the rope around his neck. Is this ancient cold case what it seems? At the turn of the 20th century, physician Albert Abrams was inspired to apply the new discovery of radio waves to medicine. He invented a complex-looking machine to diagnose any disease. Thousands flocked to be tested, but the establishment was skeptical. At Berlins Neues Museum, a bust of Egypts Queen Nefertiti portrays a woman so stunning that she has become synonymous with flawless beauty. But when experts use advanced techniques to look beneath the surface, new questions are raised about the queens appearance.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The lost colony of Roanoke is a historic mystery that has not been solved for over 400 years. An intriguing artifact was discovered in 1937: the Dare Stone. Apparently written by John White, it explains in detail what happened to the vanished colony. But is it real? World War I was the first major conflict to feature warplanes and, therefore, also the first to feature anti-air defence. How did an object resembling a satellite dish on wheels help gunners shoot down enemy planes? In Egypt, excavations of the Great Sphinx of Giza in 1817 uncovered six carved hunks of stone. Put together, they appear to be fragments of a large, braided stone beard, in the style of false beards worn by ancient pharaohs. The Sphinx never wore a beard … or did it?

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: A tense emergency unfolds as illicit drugs are found onboard a plane, paramedics rush to assist a woman displaying symptoms of a heart attack, and a glimpse into Air Traffic Control reveals how accidents are avoided. Elsewhere, airport staff strut their stuff on a catwalk, but will their unique fashion show be a hit or miss?

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: A Bali-bound flight faces delays after a service truck crashes into its undercarriage. Australian Border Force find illegal weapons in a passengers luggage. Unregistered taxi drivers are caught in the act and theres a fuel leak on the tarmac. At night, a mysterious Soviet-era plane lands unannounced.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: One of aviations worst nightmares, a fire on board can have disastrous consequences. And though these epic tragedies have exacted a terrible human cost, theyve also helped lead the way towards significantly safer skies. In Manchester, a holiday flight bound for the Mediterranean faces an inferno on the runway. In the skies over Saudi Arabia, a flight ful of pilgrims is consumed by flames. And, after a UPS cargo plane crashes in Dubai, investigators discover a tiny battery with outsize implications.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Sometimes the trust between pilots and their planes breaks down, and the cockpit inadvertently becomes a struggle that pits man against machine. Eager crowds gather at an air show to watch the new pride of French aviation, but witness a fiery disaster instead. During a routine test flight, one of the worlds most advanced planes nosedives into the Mediterranean. And, when a packed Airbus disappears over the Atlantic, investigators face a two-year deep-sea search for answers.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Pompeii was a thriving town on the southern coast of Italy, until it came to a sudden end in 79AD. The eruption of a nearby volcano, Mount Vesuvius, erupted, burying the city in millions of tonnes of ash and debris. Now excavators are digging to unearth the dark side of this idyllic Roman town by uncovering an enslaved persons room.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: The series that follows international teams of archaeologists as they embark on a season of excavations to unravel the secrets of life in the Roman Empire. How did the Colosseum - an arena for bloody gladiatorial battles - become the greatest symbol of the Roman Empire? Archaeologists venture into the Colosseums ruins, and launch digs across the Empire, to hunt for clues. As teams descend into hidden tunnels and unearth long-lost amphitheatres in Tuscany and Britain, they piece together the surprising truth about Romes iconic Colosseum.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Buried beneath Rome lies a forgotten treasure: the Golden House - a vast palace built in the first century AD. It was the most extravagant construction in the history of Rome. Why was it buried? And what can its fate reveal about its builder - Romes most notorious emperor - Nero? As experts race to save the remains of the Golden House, archaeologists uncover new clues to its fate and its connection to Neros reputation.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: At its peak in the 2nd century CE, the Roman Empire spanned three continents and controlled 25% of the worlds population. Now, archaeologists are excavating this vast frontier, investigating the monumental fortifications, fierce battles, and terrifying weapons that ensured Romes astonishing dominance.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Rome
programme.desc: Gladiators capture the imagination like no other aspect of Ancient Rome. But who were they and what was the secret of their appeal? We follow a new season of excavations to find answers. Teams scale the façade of Romes famous Colosseum, decipher warrior tombstones and unearth an extraordinary lost amphitheatre in Turkey, transforming the popular image of savage and bloodthirsty gladiator combat.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Hannah Fry visits South Korea to uncover how a nation once defined by war and division became a global force in culture, business, and technology. She explores the billion-dollar world of esports, learns Taekwondo from a blackbelt, meets a kimchi grandmaster, and Jejus legendary female divers. Along the way, she discovers how South Korea blends tradition with innovation; from family-run business empires to cutting-edge, everyday tech. With curiosity and humour, Hannah reveals how the countrys unique mix of ancient values and future-focused thinking turned it into a cultural superpower that continues to shape our lives.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The mask of Tutankhamun is one of the most famous finds of ancient Egypt, but close inspection reveals a consistent set of strange marks around all the hieroglyphs spelling Tutankhamuns name. Could the name have been engraved over top of another? In North America during World War II, strange and insidious-looking devices made of wood, rope, sandbags and gunpowder were found scattered across the northwestern USA and Canada. Who made them, and what was their sinister purpose? And in East London, a decorative clay bottle from the Middle Ages is uncovered. Not so strange, until the plug was removed and the bottles contents revealed to include rusty nails, centuries-old human hair, fingernails … and urine. What is this sorcery?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Easter Islands tall stone moai have long captured the global imagination, and there are still mysteries surrounding them. Out of nearly 1,000, why is one particular moai, called Tukuturi, the only one kneeling and sporting a beard? In 1950s USA, sightings of UFOs were a national phenomenon. Alien or not, many Americans didnt realize that the US military was working their own flying saucer: the Avrocar. And just after Newtons discoveries about gravity, 18th-century German physician Franz Anton Mesmer also proposed an invisible force that he called ""animal magnetism." To harness it, he built a device from a giant wooden tub saying it could cure any illness. Patients seemed to corroborate the claim, but could it be true?

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On January 15, 2009, US Airways Flight 1549 took off from New York Citys LaGuardia Airport and collided with a flock of birds, causing both engines to fail. Captain Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger and co-pilot Jeffrey Skyles successfully performed an emergency landing in the Hudson River, saving all 155 people on board. Survivors of the "Miracle on the Hudson" share their experiences.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: The Hidden Kingdoms of China
programme.desc: China is the worlds third biggest country by area. It has second largest economy on the planet and the largest population. But this documentary series takes you away from Chinas highly-populated mega-cities and explores the more remote locations of this fascinating country. Visiting forests, jungles, mountains and grasslands, we take a rare glimpse at parts of China that usually remain unseen. We see the wildlife that live amongst the stunning beauty of the Chinese landscapes - and how they survive in often demanding situations. With golden snub-nosed monkeys, bears, bees, elephants and the legendary giant panda. The Hidden Kingdoms of China is narrated by Michelle Yeoh.

programme.title: Extraordinary Australia
programme.desc: Australias coastline is a true natural wonder, encompassing a diverse range of bountiful habitats. Coastal seas and lands are realms of epic migrations, mesmerising mating rituals and high stakes battles between predator and prey.

programme.title: Australias Land of the Ancients
programme.desc: Australias Land of the Ancients explores the unique and ancient landscape of northeastern Australia, the most biodiverse region on the continent. From Crocodiles lying in wait for fish and hunting feral pigs to caring marsupial mothers of the far north, the film highlights some of the incredible species as they struggle to survive in their harsh environment amid a changing landscape.

programme.title: Tree Kangaroos: Ghosts of the Forest
programme.desc: Seldom seen and very rarely filmed in their natural environment, Lumholtz tree kangaroos are the ghosts of the north Queensland forests. This film follows the intimate lives of these tree-climbing specialists in the wilderness of the Atherton Tableland.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin journeys down Australias rivers to find which riparian animal is most built to survive. His first encounter is with the duck-billed platypus, a peculiar and adorable monotreme, or egg-laying mammal. Phil then gets a grip on the ultra-slimy long-finned eel and learns of its extraordinary reproductive habits before finally catching a river-dwelling bull shark.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin wanders into Australias woodlands to find the species most adapted for survival. Phil first encounters the yellow-bellied glider, an intrepid marsupial with a built-in wingsuit. Next is one of Australias most abundant but deadly reptiles, the eastern brown snake. Last but certainly not least, Phil finds the iconic, cuddly and oh-so-sleepy koala.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads into the constant heat, humidity and rainfall of the Australian rainforests to find out what it takes to be "Built to Survive." In the leafy canopy, Phil encounters the elusive tree kangaroo and its young joey, as well as Australias largest snake, the lethal scrub python. On the forest floor, the colorful cassowary acts as the rainforests gardener.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Within the Channel Country deserts, Indigenous educator Phil Breslin scours the endless sands to find three animals that not only survive the heat but thrive in unrelenting conditions. Get ready to meet Australias most impressive animals: the perentie, the continents largest lizard; the emu, its fastest flightless bird; and the mighty red kangaroo, the worlds largest marsupial.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin ventures into Australias notorious wetlands to discover three animals built for the muggy and wet environment. Phil comes face to face with the uniquely Australian freshwater crocodile, a massive predatory fish called the barramundi, and the saltwater crocodile, one of the worlds most dangerous animals and largest reptiles.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads along the cliffs and sandy flats of the Australian coast to discover which animal dominates the shoreline. His first encounter is with a white -bellied sea eagle, a bird with extremely sharp talons, followed by the estuarine stonefish, the most venomous fish in the world. Finally, Phil takes a closer look at the notorious stingray.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads into the mangroves to discover which animal is truly built to survive the mud and muck. He encounters a feisty mud crab with huge pincers and catches a shovel-nosed ray with his bare hands. Finally, Phil faces a creature we all love to hate—the mosquito—and discovers theres more to these tiny bloodsuckers than meets the eye.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads to the mysterious blue depths to discover which animal dominates the sea. His first encounter is with a tiger shark, the notorious hunter shaped like a torpedo and armed with ferocious teeth! Next, Phil dives with a group of magnificent manta rays and listens to the songs of one of the largest creatures on Earth, the majestic humpback whale.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin leaves the Australian mainland to discover which of the island-dwelling animals is truly built to survive. First up, he meets the enigmatic green turtle on the Wellesley Islands. Next, he is on KGari (Fraser Island), where he tracks down a pack of the notorious dingoes. Finally, he encounters the formidable and aptly named death adder snake.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin dares into the Australian savannah to find the species most built to survive. First is Australias largest bird of prey, the majestic but intimidating wedge-tailed eagle. Next, Phil tracks down one of the worlds deadliest snakes, the coastal taipan. Finally, Phil faces the uniquely Australian frill-necked lizard, a reptile with fascinating defense mechanisms.

programme.title: Wild India
programme.desc: The Badlands. Only the toughest predators and prey can survive the heat and harshness of Indias arid Badlands.

programme.title: Wild India

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: When on the hunt, snakes judge to perfection the very instant that separates life from death. Venomous snakes are one of the most lethal animals on the planet.

programme.title: Worlds Biggest Bullshark
programme.desc: Marine Ecologist, Dr. Neil Hammerschlag teams up with former Royal Marine Commando, James Glancy and Evolutionary Biologist, Dr. Toby Daly-Engel to uncover how Big Bull, one of the largest Bull Sharks ever caught, grew to become a giant and find out if there could be more like her.

programme.title: Return of the White Shark
programme.desc: Cape Cod — Americas Playground — is a newly emerging hotspot for a top predator. Great Whites are appearing in increasing numbers, when for centuries there were none. Through spectacular imagery, well see how the landscape of Cape Cod has changed over time, and what is luring Great Whites in record numbers.

programme.title: Cannibal Sharks
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Cannibal Sharks pulls in two of the worlds leading shark experts to unpack and analyze the mounting evidence that shark-on-shark attacks happen a lot more than we ever realized.

programme.title: Backyard Bull Shark
programme.desc: Bull sharks are invading in a big way. Found in oceans worldwide, their bullish behavior has made them famous from coast to coast. And the seven seas arent enough, theyre taking over brackish waters and rivers, too! Warmer waters due to climate change mean bull sharks can expand their range even further… so the more we learn about them now, the better.

programme.title: Sharks of the North
programme.desc: Sightings of great white sharks have been on the rise in Atlantic Canada. Alanna Canaran, a passionate science educator and dive instructor, embarks on a mission to unravel the enigmas surrounding these magnificent creatures and is determined to dispel fear of sharks in Nova Scotians. As the journey unfolds, Canaran and her team dive into the history of human-shark relationships along the coast. Facing numerous challenges, including elusive sharks and treacherous weather conditions, the team perseveres. With sheer determination and a stroke of luck, they gather invaluable knowledge of these magnificent creatures, contributing to a better understanding of white sharks in Canada.

programme.title: Sharks Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie heads to South Africa for his most dangerous mission yet. The wild waters here are a hotspot for one of the oceans most famous and fearsome predators: the great white shark. Bertie will attempt to film them hunting seals underwater without the use of a protective cage. Its highly risky, but filming without the cage is the very best way to see them behaving naturally.

programme.title: Jaguars vs. Crocs
programme.desc: Veteran wildlife photographer Steve Winter and cameraman Bertie Gregory capture the remarkable lives of Jaguars in the Pantanal of Brazil. A mother jaguar teaches her cub survival while a determined male jaguar named Scarface dives headfirst into the river to tackle the deadliest of opponents - 6-foot long caiman. Clever capybaras and playful giant otters stick with their family members to avoid being jaguar dinner

programme.title: Wild Life
programme.desc: Join wildlife filmmaker Bertie Gregory on a magical journey, as he visits stunning locations across the world to capture the beauty of some of our planets most remarkable species. Traversing unique landscapes and unrelenting environments, Bertie takes his camera lens to some of the most inhospitable locations on Earth, hoping to film iconic species in their natural habitats. In the latest installment of this National Geographic series, Bertie navigates his way to the island of South Georgia, situated between Antarctica and South America, to capture the icy regions fascinating inhabitants.

programme.title: Sharks Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie heads to South Africa for his most dangerous mission yet. The wild waters here are a hotspot for one of the oceans most famous and fearsome predators: the great white shark. Bertie will attempt to film them hunting seals underwater without the use of a protective cage. Its highly risky, but filming without the cage is the very best way to see them behaving naturally.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Return of the White Shark
programme.desc: Cape Cod — Americas Playground — is a newly emerging hotspot for a top predator. Great Whites are appearing in increasing numbers, when for centuries there were none. Through spectacular imagery, well see how the landscape of Cape Cod has changed over time, and what is luring Great Whites in record numbers.

programme.title: Cannibal Sharks
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Cannibal Sharks pulls in two of the worlds leading shark experts to unpack and analyze the mounting evidence that shark-on-shark attacks happen a lot more than we ever realized.

programme.title: Backyard Bull Shark
programme.desc: Bull sharks are invading in a big way. Found in oceans worldwide, their bullish behavior has made them famous from coast to coast. And the seven seas arent enough, theyre taking over brackish waters and rivers, too! Warmer waters due to climate change mean bull sharks can expand their range even further… so the more we learn about them now, the better.

programme.title: Sharks of the North
programme.desc: Sightings of great white sharks have been on the rise in Atlantic Canada. Alanna Canaran, a passionate science educator and dive instructor, embarks on a mission to unravel the enigmas surrounding these magnificent creatures and is determined to dispel fear of sharks in Nova Scotians. As the journey unfolds, Canaran and her team dive into the history of human-shark relationships along the coast. Facing numerous challenges, including elusive sharks and treacherous weather conditions, the team perseveres. With sheer determination and a stroke of luck, they gather invaluable knowledge of these magnificent creatures, contributing to a better understanding of white sharks in Canada.

programme.title: Cannibal Sharks

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: A panoramic view of the world of predators and their struggle for survival.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: When on the hunt, snakes judge to perfection the very instant that separates life from death. Venomous snakes are one of the most lethal animals on the planet.

programme.title: Sharks of the North

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš un Dora dodas uz Banānkalnu, lai nogādātu Isai dāvanu - Zābaciņa apgleznotu puķu podu! Dora kopā ar draugiem rīko dzimšanas dienas pārsteiguma ballīti Garnadzim. Ceļā uz svinībām Garnadzis mēģina nočiept pats savu dāvanu!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēkšņi pa nakti pazudušas Barbazū skaistās rozes. Viņš ir drošs, ka vainīga Barbabella. Bet kā lai piedabū viņu atzīties? Barbazū viņai iedod jaunu lelli, kas viņu labāk pieskatīs. // Bērni ģimenes albumā ierauga Lolitas bērnības foto. Barbatētis tādēļ nolemj bērniem pastāstīt par to, kā viņš un Lolita reiz devās ekspedīcijā uz Arktiku.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Bērni pirmoreiz brauks ar vilcienu un nakšņos viesnīcā. Mamma būs ar viņiem, bet tētis atsevišķi vedīs paštaisītos izstrādājumus. Viņiem jāpārdod savi darbiņi ikgadējā lielajā tirdziņā, ja tētis paspēs laicīgi... // Uzsniga sniegs un bērni sarīkoja pikošanos, bet Barbabo uzcēla lielisku sniegavīru. Bet kā lai viņu saglabā, kad paliks siltāks? Sākas sacensības ar laiku...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Daži dzīvnieki ir biedējoši un šķiet bīstami. Tētis stāsta savu piedzīvojumu, kad viņš ar Lolitu kāpa kalnos un satika vilku. // Rīt ir bērnu pirmā skolas diena, katrs gatavojas citādāk. Pirmā skolas diena ir satraucoša, tik daudz par ko jāpadomā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcī apmetas migrējošu pīļu bars. Rabla komandai jāpalīdz pīlēm uzsākt ceļu uz dienvidiem. Motore nevēlas doties pie dakteres Divas uz veterināro klīniku... tāpēc ķepaiņi uzbūvē īpašu, tikai viņai paredzētu telpu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Bērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Bet vecāki zina, ka vajag tikai nedaudz iztēles, lai varētu izklaidēties aŗī lietū. Bērniem iztēle ir lieliska, varbūt pat pārāk... // Barbagudrais radīja dekoderi, kurš spēj iztulkot dzīvnieku skaņas, bet dzīvnieki fermā un pagalmā neko interesantu nesaka. Barbazū lūdz iztulkot okeāna iemītnieku valodu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Aita Sūzija izdomājusi draugu Lauvu Leo. Pepa neredz Leo, bet Sūzija saka, ka Leo patīk rēkt un pārģērbties. Pepa nolemj, ka tagad viņa redz Leo. Pat mamma un tētis tagad spēlē līdzi. Džordžs jūtas atstumts.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora ceļo pa lietusmežu, sacerot dziesmiņu tētim, lai kopā ar viņu nosvinētu Tēta un Doras dienu! Dora ir gatava Čurro fiestai, taču izrādās, ka visus našķus ir apēduši Pirātrukši. Dora dodas meklēt īpašu dārgumu lādi, kurā paslēpti zelta čurro.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par saviem pētījumiem Arktikā un jūras dzelmē.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras draugi krabīši grasās precēties, bet Garnadzis nočiepj gredzenu un pazaudē to okeānā. Dora dodas to meklēt. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vikuņu Vikiju, kura pazaudējusi savu burvju flautu un nevar atgriezties Mākoņu valstībā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo kā slepenais aģents vada izmeklēšanu, bruņojies ar saviem rīkiem, lai uzzinātu, kurš nozaga Barbatēta torti.

programme.title: Dora

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Tētis paskaidro Barbabravo un Barbalalai, ka viņi var spēlēties, kā vēlas, bet bērni nesaprot, ka tētis neļāva viņiem kļūt par maziem dumpiniekiem. // Kas ir Barbapapas? Viņi ir dažādās krāsās, spēj transformēties, daži ir spalvaini. Atbildi var atras tikai Barbazinātne.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala rīko lielo talantu konkursu. Katram barbabērnam uz skatuves jādemonstrē savs lielākais talants, nekādas nīkuļošanas! // Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāmāk izbaudīt jauki laikapstākļi. Vecāki izlemj bērniem radīt jautras rotaļas ārā. Bet lomas un mīklas jādala uzmanīgi, lai nerodas pārsteīgumi.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Mistera Stingrā dvīņi apciemo barbabērnus. Barbabērni sarīko dvīņiem dārgumu medības un atpūtu dabā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora uzzina, ka viņas vecmamma nav svinējusi savus Pieaugšanas svētkus, un sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti ar īpašu kleitu, diadēmu un kurpēm! Doras draugam Koko nav aizraujoša stāsta, ar ko izklaidēt biedrus, tāpēc viņi dodas pie Pastāstu koka!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš lūdz jauno lietus mākonīti Klaudiju piepildīt izžuvušu ūdens slidkalniņu. Zābaciņam piemetas astiņkute, kuru var izārstēt burvju vardīte - ja vien nopelnīs savas burvju svītras, palīdzot draugiem lietusmežā.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala ir pārliecināta, ka dzirdēja milzu vistu klīstam pa māju. Barbabērni stāv sardzē.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē. Tims un Kaja cenšas sarīkot Pārkijam neaizmirstamu dienu. Kad vētras dēļ Reksiem jāpaliek mājās, viņiem jāizdomā, kā pavadīt laiku.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas. Barbabella pavada nemierīgu nakti kukaiņu dēļ.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Isa rīko ballīti, kurā visi dejos Mūžameža ritmu. Ceļā uz svētkiem Zābaciņam jāpagūst iemācīties dejas soļus! Dora ar draugiem dodas uz Likstu un Lamatu Mežu, lai atrastu Tiko burvju riekstu, kurš spēj pārvērsties par ikviena mīļāko našķi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabravo noķer mistisku maskētu vandāli, kurš cenšas bēgt pēc mājas apzīmēšanas. Pie lietas ķeras detektīvs un doktors. // Barbabravo mīļākā mašīna pazūd no viesistabas. To meklējot Barbabravo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais zem dīvāna atrod dīvainu caurumu. Ja nu mašīna aizkrita līdz zemes centram?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Nē! Nē! Tas nav beidzies! Barbabravo nav mazs, viņš ir liels puika! No šis dienas viņš tā arī dzīvos - nekādu snaudu, uzkodu un spēlēšanās ar brāļiem un māsām. // Barbabērni pirmoreiz dodas uz lielveikalu. Tik daudz preču, lieliska vieta! Bet kāpēc viss satīts plastmasas plēvēs?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Uz Padingtonu lielu iespaidu atstāj ugunsdzēsēju runa par drošību. Kad notiek īsta nelaime, Padingtons steidz palīgā. Mateo un Džūdija nodibina slepenu klubu koka mājā, bet liedz Džonatanam un Padingtonam tajā iestāties bez paroles.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mērei Greitvejai vajag daudz picas, un ātri! Bet, kad pieslēdzas Ātrmeistars, suņiem jānovērš viņa picas problēma. Kad ģimene pa Ātrmeistara ceļu nevar pagūt uz lidostu, Rabla komandai līdz izlidošanai jāuzbūvē jauns ceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Max and the Midknights
programme.desc: When the Gnomes of Tresk are kidnapped by a mysterious evil, Max and the Midknights volunteer to save them. Max is thrilled to go on a new quest, but her plans go awry when she learns that Simon doesnt want to go. Having just settled into Byjovia with his new family, Simon would rather stay home. Despite feeling sad, the Midknights tell him that they understand how he feels. Sadly, Mumblin must also sit out the journey after an accidental tumble down the library steps leaves him in a full body cast. The Midknights set sail down two members. The morning they leave though, Simon has a change of heart. With the help of his animal patients, Simon rushes to the docks to try and catch the Midknights before they sail away from Byjovia. As Simon nears the ship, he and the Midknights are confronted by the angry Clatterback. In the nick of time, Simon convinces the animal to let them go. Simon tells the Midknights that he has changed his mind. They are his family and hes going on this quest with them.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max is missing the superhero fame and fans he used to have before going undercover, but discovers that Booch is a local celebrity thanks to her sandwich-stacking record at Splat by the Sea. Jealous of her autograph-seeking fans and the sandwich named for her on the menu, Max decides to break her record and capture the glory for himself. Despite Chloe begging him not to displace her friend, Max breaks the record and reaps the rewards. When Chloe see that Booch is upset that she no longer has the record or a sandwich on the menu she can eat, Chloe trains to beat Maxs new record and make things right for Booch. Meanwhile, Jinx claims his everlasting servitude to Phoebe after she saves him from an accident.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: On their way back from Lake World, the Wylde Paks get stuck in a massive traffic jam. The situation gets so dire that all the drivers have no choice but to set up camp - a camp that quickly turns into its own, self-governing, rudimentary society. Struggling with a vacuum of power, Jack is chosen as their reluctant leader, but hes determined to usher them into peace. Meanwhile, Lily catches feelings for a boy in a nearby car, but because the boys dad and Will have serious road rage beef, their romance is forbidden. // Desperate to leave their mark on Canyon Valley, Jack and Lily set out to capture the great beast of Canyon Valley Lake - a giant fish that has menaced the town for years. After being swallowed whole multiple times, Lily and Jack realize they must take a different approach, but then they hear horror stories from other townsfolk about their own run-ins with the giant fish proving that bagging the beast is an impossible task. Despite all this, Lily and Jack attempt to accomplish the impossible.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark
programme.desc: Over the years, the Maltos and the Autobots have vanquished foes and protected Earth from destruction, but some victories have come at a tragic cost... Now, some are painting the heroes as villains and the Maltos must face those consequences. Even though Robbys powers give him status amongst his peers and purpose in his community, when hes caught abusing his power, hes unwittingly proving his detractors right. Sensing something is wrong, Mo and "Detective" Thrash team up to prove their brother was set up. Meanwhile, Twitch obsesses over mistakes shes made in the past and she becomes her own worst enemy. Still, the Maltos and the Autobots rally to battle enemies who will stop at nothing to destroy them - and other worlds. Twitch fails her team when they need her the most, and Robby cant be there for his sister to lean on. Luckily, an old ally arrives in in time to help. In the end, the heroes unite and end the fight, but the Maltos may never be the same again.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max appears to have willingly switched to the villains side, prompting President Kickbutt to assign Captain Perfect as Phoebes new superhero partner. Max quickly gains the villains trust and leads Kiefer and the other henchmen to his house to fight Phoebe and Captain Perfect. During the fight, Max and Kiefer capture Phoebe and Captain Perfect. Max reveals he was never really evil, but was only pretending to gain access to the Chip-Chucker. Max and Phoebe defeat Kiefer and the henchmen, and they discover that the Chip-Chucker contains technology that leads them to the identitly of the Mastermind, who is revealed to be Lazlo Chance, B.C.s father. Chloe is anxious about going to the dance with B.C. and keeps trying to avoid him whenever a slow song comes on. Seeking help from Phoebe, she hides in the photo booth to teleport home. However, Jinx and Booch find a photo of her mid-teleport (they cannot see who did the teleporting), leading them to believe theres a superhero among them.

programme.title: Max and the Midknights
programme.desc: As the Midknights sail across the sea on their latest quest, Max realizes the gang might be a little rusty. Kevyn and Millie arent seeing eye to eye, Simon is preoccupied helping his animal clients from long distance, and Uncle Budrick is terribly seasick! However, Max is certain she can get them working as a team. But when Uncle Budrick is spooked by something sinister in the shadows below deck, he is convinced he saw a ghost! Determined to get back on mission, Max leads the charge to search the ship and find whatever mysterious presence might be haunting them. They soon find theres no ghost at all-theyve been spooked by a stowaway, the former King of Byjovia, Gastley! But as the Midknights are distracted, the ship veers off course and into a powerful storm! They quickly realize they must act as a team in order to steady the ship before it capsizes! Meanwhile, back in Byjovia, Mumblin fears someone might be behind his recent spate of accidents, and takes matters into his own hands...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe has been absent from school while on missions with her siblings, and is assigned summer school to make up her missing work. Max thinks its hilarious that she will have to spend the summer in school, until he is also informed that he will be the teacher. While they both pout about having to be in class all summer, Phoebe goes solo on some superhero mission. When a couple villains get the upper hand, a mysterious new superhero names Captain Perfect arrives to rescue her. Phoebe discovers that she and Captain Perfect have many of the same interests, and make a good crime-fighting team. As Phoebe wonders if she might have a new partner, Captain Perfect privately lets a contact know that he has earned Phoebes trust and is ready for the next phase of his assignment.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark
programme.desc: Over the years, the Maltos and the Autobots have vanquished foes and protected Earth from destruction, but some victories have come at a tragic cost... Now, some are painting the heroes as villains and the Maltos must face those consequences. Even though Robbys powers give him status amongst his peers and purpose in his community, when hes caught abusing his power, hes unwittingly proving his detractors right. Sensing something is wrong, Mo and "Detective" Thrash team up to prove their brother was set up. Meanwhile, Twitch obsesses over mistakes shes made in the past and she becomes her own worst enemy. Still, the Maltos and the Autobots rally to battle enemies who will stop at nothing to destroy them - and other worlds. Twitch fails her team when they need her the most, and Robby cant be there for his sister to lean on. Luckily, an old ally arrives in in time to help. In the end, the heroes unite and end the fight, but the Maltos may never be the same again.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: On their way back from Lake World, the Wylde Paks get stuck in a massive traffic jam. The situation gets so dire that all the drivers have no choice but to set up camp - a camp that quickly turns into its own, self-governing, rudimentary society. Struggling with a vacuum of power, Jack is chosen as their reluctant leader, but hes determined to usher them into peace. Meanwhile, Lily catches feelings for a boy in a nearby car, but because the boys dad and Will have serious road rage beef, their romance is forbidden. // Desperate to leave their mark on Canyon Valley, Jack and Lily set out to capture the great beast of Canyon Valley Lake - a giant fish that has menaced the town for years. After being swallowed whole multiple times, Lily and Jack realize they must take a different approach, but then they hear horror stories from other townsfolk about their own run-ins with the giant fish proving that bagging the beast is an impossible task. Despite all this, Lily and Jack attempt to accomplish the impossible.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: When Jack finally gets a phone, his first text (a joke about Will) goes to the family group chat instead of Lily! This forces the kids to follow their dad through town without him knowing, in an attempt to delete the message before he has a chance to read it, and puts them in situations so awkward and uncomfortable that Jack will forever think twice before hitting "send" again. // The family discovers there is one more precious hallasand cookie left and agree to share it, but before they can, it suddenly goes missing. All fingers point to Halmoni, and the family calls an emergency family tribunal to prove her guilt or her innocence. Each family member has their own recounting of the day leading up to the theft, and each story is wildly different.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max appears to have willingly switched to the villains side, prompting President Kickbutt to assign Captain Perfect as Phoebes new superhero partner. Max quickly gains the villains trust and leads Kiefer and the other henchmen to his house to fight Phoebe and Captain Perfect. During the fight, Max and Kiefer capture Phoebe and Captain Perfect. Max reveals he was never really evil, but was only pretending to gain access to the Chip-Chucker. Max and Phoebe defeat Kiefer and the henchmen, and they discover that the Chip-Chucker contains technology that leads them to the identitly of the Mastermind, who is revealed to be Lazlo Chance, B.C.s father. Chloe is anxious about going to the dance with B.C. and keeps trying to avoid him whenever a slow song comes on. Seeking help from Phoebe, she hides in the photo booth to teleport home. However, Jinx and Booch find a photo of her mid-teleport (they cannot see who did the teleporting), leading them to believe theres a superhero among them.

programme.desc: SpongeBob is bitten by DoodleBob while studying for an exam. SpongeBob shrugs it off, mistaking it for a papercut. But under the moonlight, SpongeBob turns into a mischievous creature called the WereDoodle! As the WereDoodle, he wreaks havoc all over town, doodling on everything. Mr. Krabs leads a hunt to end the chaos, but DoodleBob arrives to apologize for WereDoodles wrongdoings and lift the curse... until Mr. Krabs gets a papercut and becomes the new WereDoodle! // Its gorilla suit day! To celebrate, SpongeBob dresses up in a gorilla suit with Patrick dressed as his handler. As they run around town, people mistake SpongeBob for a real gorilla, causing panic that leads to SpongeBob being taken off to the zoo. Meanwhile, an actual gorilla escapes the zoo, running around town causing even more havoc. The mix-up is eventually cleared-just in time for Squidward to have one final run-in with another gorilla.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: Max and the Midknights
programme.desc: When the Midknights ship is set off course, the team must survive treacherous new waters. Before Max can enact her plan, she is summoned to Wizard Court where Mumblin is on trial for his life. Max must help Mumblin prove that he is a good wizard and that he escaped the afterlife to help the Midknights defeat Fendra. If Max cant, Mumblin will be sent away for good. Max calls on the Midknights to testify on Mumblins behalf. When those attempts fail, Max takes the stand. At first, Maxs emotional testimony seems to win over the court, but her pleas for Mumblins freedom backfire and Mumblin is ultimately found guilty. Luckily, Kevyn discovers a way to save Mumblin. Max must battle the Worms of Justice and if she wins, then Mumblin will be set free. Transported to a desert, Max battles giant worms. In the end, Max defeats the worms and Mumblin wins his trial. Unfortunately, the Midknights are sent back to their boat, which is headed straight for a massive waterfall!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Its time for the Great Smurf Games in the village! The big prize? A magical sphere that grants all the members of the winning team one wish of their choice. Clumsy sees this as the perfect opportunity to become Agile Smurf, but no one wants to team up with him. Gargamel is also looking forward to the games because he wants to use the sphere to capture all the Smurfs! Hes well prepared and has set up traps all over the forest. The Great Games start with the traditional relay race. During the race, Storm and Grouchy are captured by Gargamel, who learns that only one Smurf who wins the Great Games will get a wish. So, he decides to send Dwayne and Rowena to take part in the Games, disguised as Storm and Grouchy. They go looking for the magical sphere, that has now been taken by Clumsy. They offer to team up with him, to his great surprise...

Meanwhile, Chloes crush invites her to his fathers product launch party at Splat By The Sea, at the same time Jinx and Booch want Chloe to protest the wealthy family outside the party. Unable to hurt anyones feelings, Chloe tries to use her powers to be in two places at once.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Its election day and Bester finds herself running for President of the Book Club against her good friend Rocky. // When Best and Bester accidently list the Sub as a guest house, they receive a visitor who they simply must impress.

programme.title: Max and the Midknights
programme.desc: After their near-disastrous run-in with the trolls, Max decides to play it safe and lead the Midknights down a seemingly serene garden trail. Unfortunately, Maxs choice causes the quest to take a turn when the gang encounters an unexpected obstacle.

programme.title: Dora the Explorer Global
programme.desc: Dora is an interactive animated series about the cheerful and enterprising young girl Dora who likes to travel through the jungle of South America with her little monkey Boots. Her father and mother live in the jungle. Dora is curious of everything and wants to know about animals, flowers and plants of the forest. When she travels she always take with her a little back with survival equipment and a singing map.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger
programme.desc: Henry Hart is a normal eighth grade student, with an out of school job that takes him on amazing adventures. His cool part time gig as Kid Danger, takes him on out of this world adventures as the sidekick-in-training to famous superhero Captain Man. They go on bizarre and crazy travels, battling criminals and villains that try to attack his hometown and Captain Man himself. Meanwhile at home, Henry has to stay in hiding, keeping his sidekick job as a secret from his best friends, Charlotte and Jasper, and little sister Piper. What exciting adventures will Kid Danger get up to with Captain Man and will be he be able to hide his alter ego from his friends and family?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: As one of Aangs little detours, the group heads toward the island of Kyoshi. But soon they learn that the townspeople dont trust foreigners at all; however, when Aang proves to them that he is the Avatar they are treated as guests of honor. Katara wants to get some supplies and leave as soon as possible, while Aang is enjoying his time as a celebrity. Little do they know, though, that the Fire Nation has tracked them down. Also, Sokka meets and trains with a female warrior named Suki. Will Aang be able to save the village from the wrath of the Fire Nation?

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: Kamp Koral

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Loud House
